metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8251 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Node.js < 14.11.0 is vulnerable to HTTP denial of service (DoS) attacksbased on delayed requests submission which can make the server unable toaccept new connections.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8251` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode108 - 18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1
nodejs - 18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.7.0+dfsg-5ubuntu1').
